title: 이달의소녀탐구 #452 (LOONA TV #452)
summary:
0:01 -- ChuuLip are checking each other's heartbeat. Chuu will be playing the piano.
0:16 -- OEC seems restless but Choerry is positive. Quiet "fighing~".
0:35 -- Choerry and JinSoul seem calm but Kim Lip is losing it. Choerry tries to help her: "Ah! You changed your hair color. The fans might think it's hot."
0:50 -- LipSoul both took the relaxing pill as well.
